headline: Blackstone Inc (BX) Strikes Big Deal in Women’s Healthcare Space
summary: Blackstone Inc (NYSE:BX) is one of the best NYSE stocks to buy for the long term. Blackstone Inc (NYSE:BX) led a $10 billion debt investment in the Australian AI infrastructure company Firmus, Reuters reported on February 9. Confirming the deal, Firmus said in a press release on February 9 that it would use the financing […]
